files.text:
---
title: Introduction
apiPriority: 1
---

# Sula  Angular UI Components


## Installation

```
ng add @ngx-kit/sula
```


## Links

* [github](https://github.com/ngx-kit/sula)
* [website](https://sula.ngx-kit.com)
* [ngx-kit twitter](https://twitter.com/ngxkit)
files.name: INTRO
files.content:
# Sula  Angular UI Components


## Installation

```
ng add @ngx-kit/sula
```


## Links

* [github](https://github.com/ngx-kit/sula)
* [website](https://sula.ngx-kit.com)
* [ngx-kit twitter](https://twitter.com/ngxkit)

files.text:
### Usage

1. Import `UiNotificationModule` module into the root.

```typescript
...
imports: [
  ...
  UiNotificationModule.forRoot(),
],
```

2. Use `UiNotificationService` api to show notifications.
files.name: README
files.content:
### Usage

1. Import `UiNotificationModule` module into the root.

```typescript
...
imports: [
  ...
  UiNotificationModule.forRoot(),
],
```

2. Use `UiNotificationService` api to show notifications.
